Title: Campus Mantri (Official Representative) of GeeksforGeeks
Description: Appointed as the official Campus Mantri for GeeksforGeeks at Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology. Responsible for promoting GeeksforGeeks initiatives, organizing tech events, and acting as a liaison between GeeksforGeeks and the student community. My role involves leadership, brand advocacy, and fostering a tech-driven learning environment to increase student engagement.
Location: Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology collage  Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh

Title: Intern
